name: RanDOME Life
description:
This Game has been made in Less than 24h during the BEST GAME JAM EVER!

https://itch.io/jam/randome-game-jam

The theme was selected via an idea generator made by the Super Games Bros

The goal of the game is to lead your blobs to the portal for the next level .

BUT ! this is supposed to be a game of life so you can only interract by creating a food source with your left mouseclick(other means of interraction were planned).

A Second part of the game was supposed to be the opposite ( where you create predator and the goal is total destruction) but due to a lack of time we could not complete this part (AKA we slow :D ).

Have Fun and thx for playing :D
